products.name: Dyson Motorhead Animal Stick Vacuum (DC72)
products.shortDescription: Experience the premium cleaning power of Dyson. This bagless vacuum uses an outer cyclone to capture debris while inner cyclones capture microscopic dust that escapes the grip of other machines. Designed to never lose suction, this small but efficient cleaner makes every hard and carpeted surface in your home pristinely clean.

products.name: Samsung Canister Vacuum (VC12F50HNDU/AC) - Blue
products.shortDescription: Tackle tough carpets and more with the Samsung VC12F5OHNDU Two Step Brush canister vacuum. Featuring Cyclone Force Multi technology, this vacuum delivers exceptional suction power to pick up dirt and dust. An advanced HEPA filtration system traps dust and allergens, while accessories make it easy to clean floors, furniture, and more.

products.name: LG 1.1 Cu. Ft. Microwave (LMC1195ST) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Cook, reheat, and defrost foods with ease using the LG 1.1-cubic-foot countertop microwave. Featuring a moisture dome and turntable, this microwave keeps your meals moist as you cook, continually rotating it for even results.

products.name: Keurig 2.0 4-Cup Coffee Maker (K300) - Black
products.shortDescription: This Keurig Coffee Maker is the 2nd generation of brewers that brews both single cup and carafe, providing the perfect beverage every time. This brewer offers a bigger size selection with brew strength control, and intuitively simple and interactive proprietary technology.

products.name: Samsung Canister Vacuum (VC12F70PRJC/AC) - Silver
products.shortDescription: The chore of vacuuming is made easier with the Samsung VCF700G canister vacuum. Featuring Cyclone Force Multi technology and a 12.7" Power Brush, this vacuum delivers exceptional suction power to pick up dust, dirt, and allergens. The large cambered wheels and swivel body make it a breeze to manoeuvre the vacuum anywhere in your home.

products.name: Samsung 4.8 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer & 7.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Steam Dryer - Silver
products.shortDescription: Make laundry more efficient with this Samsung washer and dryer. It comes with a 4.8 cu. ft. front-load washer and 7.5 cu. ft. electric dryer. ***Please Note: Pedestal sold separately.

products.name: Dyson Animal Stick Vacuum (DC62AN) - Purple
products.shortDescription: From poodle hair on the couch to dust on the ceiling, the Dyson DC62 Animal stick vacuum can tackle those hard-to-reach cleaning jobs. Boasting an advanced motorized head and Tier 2 Radial Cyclone Technology, this lightweight vacuum can pick up even the finest dust particles. Its detachable long-reach wand makes it a breeze to suck up dirt and debris in confined spaces.

products.name: Bodum Bistro Electric Blade Coffee Grinder (10903-01US) - Black
products.shortDescription: To achieve the most flavour from coffee beans, you must grind them right before they come in contact with hot water. This is where the Bodum Bistro Electric Burr Coffee Grinder comes in. With over 14 settings from coarse to fine, you can get the ideal grind for any brewing method.

products.name: Frigidaire 30" 18 Cu. Ft. Top Mount Refrigerator (FFTR1814QW) - White
products.shortDescription: Store your groceries in the freshness of the Frigidaire 18 cu. ft. top freezer refrigerator. Featuring Store-More crisper drawers and SpaceWise adjustable wire shelves, this fridge can accommodate a range of foods from fresh vegetables to chocolate cake.

products.name: Haier 3.0 Cu. Ft. Top Load Washer and 6.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Dryer with Hamper Door - White
products.shortDescription: Make laundry a breeze with this Haier washer and dryer. It comes with a 3.0 cu. ft. top-load washer and 6.5 cu. ft. electric dryer. ***Please Note: Pedestal sold separately.

products.name: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine (BREBES870XL) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: The Breville Barista Express is a programmable, semi-automatic espresso machine that's engineered to deliver espresso in under a minute. It has a built-in grinder with adjustments so you can control how fine you want your beans to be ground.

products.name: Haier 3.2 Cu. Ft Bar Fridge (HC32SA42SB) - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect for a dorm room, office lunch space or basement rec room, this Haier 3.2 cu.ft. bar fridge will keep all your favourite food fresh and beverages cold. It includes a can dispenser, three full width shelves and a gallon door bin that's ideal for larger bottles and cartons.

products.name: Bosch 24" Tall Tub Built-In Dishwasher (SHE65T55UC) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: At 44dBA, this Bosch dishwasher is quietest in its class. It is 3" deeper than previous generations, while still providing a flush installation, making them one of the largest capacity models on the market. The 500 series adds a V-shaped third rack, which allows culinary tools like whisks and tongs to be loaded.

products.name: Breville Venezia Expresso Machine (BREBES250XL)
products.shortDescription: Skip the fancy coffee shop and create a caffeinated concoction of your own with this Breville Venezia espresso maker. The Thermocoil Heating System ensures that the water is heated to the correct temperature for a perfect cup every time, and the stainless steel, silver metallic design will make a stunning impression in your kitchen.

products.name: Dyson Cinetic Animal Canister Vacuum (DC78THAN)
products.shortDescription: Experience the premium cleaning power of Dyson. This bagless vacuum uses an outer cyclone to capture debris while inner cyclones capture microscopic dust that escapes the grip of other machines. Designed to never lose suction, this small but efficient cleaner makes every hard and carpeted surface in your home pristinely clean.

products.name: Samsung 27" 5.2 Cu. Ft. Front Load Washer & 27" 7.5 Cu. Ft. Electric Steam Dryer - Silver
products.shortDescription: Do laundry more efficiently with this Samsung washer and dryer bundle. It comes with a 5.2 cu. ft. front-load washer and a 7.5 cu. ft. electric dryer. ***Please Note: Pedestal sold separately.

products.name: Haier 5.0 Cu. Ft. Chest Freezer (HCM050EC) - White
products.shortDescription: Favourite frozen foods on sale? Buy them in bulk. This Haier chest freezer gives you a huge 5.0 cu. ft. capacity with removable basket so it can hold up to 175 pounds of frozen food for you and your family. A front side adjustable thermostat control is easy to access.

products.name: Haier 36.4" 7.1 Cu. Ft. Chest Freezer (HCM071AW) - White
products.shortDescription: Add this Haier chest freezer to your home and you'll always have room to store your bulk frozen purchases. Its 7.1 cu. ft. capacity can hold up to a whopping 249lbs of food, so you won't have to worry about making space in your fridge's freezer.

products.name: Dyson Hot + Cool Fan (AM05) - Blue
products.shortDescription: Snuggle up in a well-heated room or take a refreshing break from the summer heat with this practical Dyson AM05 Hot + Cool fan. Its Air Multiplier technology uses the surrounding air to produce comforting warmth or a cooling breeze. Without visible heating elements or fast-spinning blades, you can safely place it in any room.

products.name: De'Longhi Single Serve Espresso Machine (EC220CD) - Black
products.shortDescription: Get your coffee how you like it without having to wait in line with this Delonghi espresso machine. It offers 15 bars of pressure with a swivel jet frother for the perfect cup every time. The drip tray and water tank are removable for easy cleaning.

products.name: Dyson Digital Slim Multi Floor Vacuum (DC35)
products.shortDescription: Equipped with Dyson's digital motor and Root Cyclone technology, the DC35 is a dirt-sucking, power-efficient cordless vacuum. It features hygienic bin emptying, dual power mode, and a variety of attachments that will make cleaning any room feel like less of a chore.

products.name: GE Compact Bar Fridge (GMR05BLHCSCA) - Clean Steel
products.shortDescription: Store the small stuff in this compact refrigerator from GE. It makes a perfect fit for areas such as college dorms, entertaining areas, or cabins. The can dispenser and a storage rack that can accommodate a 2L bottle make this fridge handy for storing cold drinks.

products.name: Samsung 36" 31.8 Cu.Ft. French 4-Door Refrigerator (RF32FMQDBSR) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Sleek, modern and totally state-of-the-art, the stainless steel Samsung RF32FMQDBSR 4-door French door refrigerator has a roomy 6.1 cu. ft. convertible zone with four temperature settings for customized cooling.

products.name: Dyson Animal Canister Vacuum (DC37TH AN)
products.shortDescription: The Dyson DC37 TurbineHead Animal can clean both your home and your pet with ease. It uses Ball technology for easy maneuvering around your home. Featuring Dyson's powerful Radial Root Cyclone technology, this is one vacuum that never loses power or suction. And when it's time to groom your pet, the included groom tool captures allergens and self-cleans afterwards.

products.name: Danby 3.3 Cu.Ft. Bar Fridge (DBC120BLS) - Black
products.shortDescription: Store up to 120 ice cold beverages in any room with this 3.3 cu. ft. bar fridge from Danby. Compact and stylish, this beverage centre looks good in any room, with a tempered glass door and stainless steel trim. It features 3.5 adjustable wire shelves, a mechanical thermostat and integrated lock and key.

products.name: GE Compact Refrigerator (GMR03BLHCSC) - CleanSteel
products.shortDescription: Keep pop, milk and a few fresh apples on hand in a GE Compact Refrigerator. Ideal for dorm rooms, basement bars, cabins and other places you want to store a cold one without squeezing in a full size appliance, this compact yet capacious fridge does just the trick.

products.name: GE Wine Cooler (PXR03FLSFSC) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: One day you'll get the wine cellar of your dreams. For now, there's the GE Wine Chiller. You'll enjoy a perfectly chilled glass of wine every time, thanks to the customized storage temperature. It also comes equipped with wire shelves that hold up to 29 bottles of vino.

products.name: Frigidaire 20.7 Cu. Ft. Upright Freezer (FFU21M7HW) - White
products.shortDescription: For spacious storage of frozen goods, this Frigidaire upright freezer gives you 20.7 cubic feet of frosty goodness. Featuring Frigidaire Store-More features like tilt-out bins and adjustable door bins, this freezer maximizes space. The Soft Freeze Zone even lets you store ice cream at perfect scooping temperature: no more bent spoons.

products.name: LG 30" 22 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator (LFC22770ST) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Keep both your popsicles and your pop cans at eye level in a French door refrigerator from LG. Multi-Air Flow Cooling breezes through every inch of its 22cu. ft. capacity to maintain optimal freshness. Whatever you're preparing, there's no bending over to grab ingredients and the French doors let you organize your food optimally.

products.name: LG 1.5 Cu. Ft. Microwave (LMS1531ST) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: For speedy snacks, quick reheats and easy meals, an LG Electronics microwave enables custom cooking quicker than a conventional oven. This stainless steel unit beams 1100 watts of energy towards the preparation of popcorn, rice, potatoes, frozen entrees, vegetables and more, giving you the power to control your cooking right down to the second.

products.name: Haier 4.6 Cu. Ft. 150-Can Capacity Beverage Center (ZHBCN05FVS) - Silver/Black
products.shortDescription: Keep your office, dorm room, or home bar supplied with all your favourite beverages. Haier's Beverage Centre accommodates up to 150 bottles or cans on four full width shelves that adjust to suit your stock of drinks. Set up the glass door to open from either side to fit the layout of your space.

products.name: iRobot Roomba Vacuum Cleaning Robot (770)
products.shortDescription: They always said that robots would eventually take over. Well, if they want to start with the vacuuming, the Roomba 770 can have it! This unassuming robot moves from room to room vacuuming up to 98% of dirt, dust and pet hair all without being asked to do so.
